root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 3-b-3, translated into en
root.data: Goal 3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages3.b Support research and development of vaccines and drugs against diseases, communicable or not, which mainly affect the inhabitants of developing countries, provide affordable access to essential drugs and vaccines, in accordance with the Declaration Doha Round of the Agreement on Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights (TRIPS) and Public Health, which reaffirms the right of developing countries to take full advantage of the flexibility provisions of this agreement when it comes to protecting public health and, in particular, ensuring universal access to medicines3.b.3.Proportion of health facilities with a constant supply of essential drugs at an affordable costThis is the percentage of health facilities that have a constant supply of essential drugs at an affordable cost compared to all health facilities%Ratio of health facilities with constant access to an affordable set of essential drugs to all health facilities, multiplied by 100;Not available
